testcase.name: Checkout fails when the Zip/Postal Code is missing

failure.message: Expected: a string containing "Error: Postal Code is required" but: was "Thank you for your order!"

testcase.failure: Expected: a string containing "Error: Postal Code is required" but: was "Thank you for your order!"
